channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AL

item.title: Report X-2023090520
item.description:
Report X-2023090520

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-04T18:16:05+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: BIRMINGHAM
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was sent up the belt from the unload and sent down the primary dump chute. Package was not sitting upright where the arrows on the box were not pointing upwards. This caused one of the bottles inside to leak. DescribePack: Internal leakage from one of the bottles inside, corroding the box. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was a minor leak. None of the liquid made it around the box.

item.title: Report X-2023090376
item.description:
Report X-2023090376

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-01
  • City: BIRMINGHAM
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet on trailer and open. A gasoline smell was emitting from the package. package was taken off the trailer and put in a hazardous bin. DescribePack: Bottles inside were bent in as if they were squeezed. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: outer box soaked up most of the leak. what little was left had evaporated.

item.title: Report X-2023090730
item.description:
Report X-2023090730

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: MONTGOMERY
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO PACKAGE WEARING PROPER PPE, DECISION TREE IN HAND. RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGE LEAKING INSIDE TRAILER. USING APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER CONTAINED LEAKER AND TRANSPORTED TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023090274
item.description:
Report X-2023090274

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: THEODORE
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Damage happened in transit and was discovered when delivery was attempted. Damaged hazmat was given to BC who gave it to QA to be processed. WA628 DescribePack: 2 out of 4 glass bottles were shattered releasing their acetone DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat was placed into secure hazmat cage
